   etatpuṇyānubhāvena bodhisatvāḥ sadā bhave /	etat puNya anuBAvena boDisatvAH sadA Bave /

   nānārūpadharāḥ sarve satvārthasādhanodyatāḥ /	nAnA rUpa DarAH sarve satva arTa sADana udyatAH /

   kramāt pāramitāḥ sarvāḥ paripūrya śubhānvitāḥ /	kramAt pAramitAH sarvAH paripUrya SuBa anvitAH /
   sarvakleśagaṇāñ jitvā pariśuddhās trimaṇḍalāḥ // Rm_17.178{79} //	sarva kleSa gaNAn jitvA pariSudDAH tri maNxalAH // Rm_17.178{79} //
   jitvā māragaṇāñ cāpi prāpya saṃbodhim uttamāṃ /	jitvA mAra gaNAn ca api prApya saMboDim uttamAm /

   ye 'tītā jinās te 'pi triratnabhajanodyamāt /	ye atItAH jinAH te api tri ratna Bajana udyamAt /

   varttamānā jinās te 'pi triratnabhajanodbhavaiḥ /	varttamAnAH jinAH te api tri ratna Bajana udBavEH /
   puṇyair bodhiṃ samāsādya gacheyur nirvṛtiṃ tathā // Rm_17.181{82} //	puNyEH boDim samAsAdya gaCeyuH nirvRtim taTA // Rm_17.181{82} //
   anāgatā jinās te 'pi triratnabhajanodbhavaiḥ /	anAgatAH jinAH te api tri ratna Bajana udBavEH /
   puṇyair evaṃ kramād bodhiṃ prāpya yāsyanti nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_17.182{83} //	puNyEH evam kramAt boDim prApya yAsyanti nirvRtim // Rm_17.182{83} //
   ahaṃ cāpi tathā nūnaṃ triratnabhajanodyamī /	aham ca api taTA nUnam tri ratna Bajana udyamI /

   tathāham api sarvatra kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat /	taTA aham api sarvatra kRtvA Darma mayam jagat /
   sarvān bodhau niyojyaivaṃ yāsyāmi nirvṛtiṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_17.184{85} //	sarvAn boDO niyojya evam yAsyAmi nirvRtim Druvam // Rm_17.184{85} //
   evaṃ ye ye bhajanty atra triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /	evam ye ye Bajanti atra tri ratna SaraNam gatAH /
   te te sarve 'pi saṃbodhiṃ prāpya nirvṛtim āyayuḥ // Rm_17.185{86} //	te te sarve api saMboDim prApya nirvRtim AyayuH // Rm_17.185{86} //
   (Rm 226)	(Rm 226)
   iti matvātra saṃsāre nirvṛtipadavāṃchinaḥ /	iti matvA atra saMsAre nirvRti padavAMCinaH /

   ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te janāḥ /	iti Adizwam muni indreNa SrutvA sarve api te janAH /

   tadā tatra janāḥ sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /	tadA tatra janAH sarve tri ratna SaraNam gatAH /

   etatpuṇyānubhāvais tu tadā samaṃtataḥ /	etat puNya anuBAvEH tu tadA samaMtataH /

   iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /	iti me guruNA AKyAtam Srutam mayA taTA ucyate /

   prajāś cāpi tathā dharmaṃ śrāvayitvā prabodhayan /	prajAH ca api taTA Darmam SrAvayitvA praboDayan /
   triratnabhajanaṃ nityaṃ kārayituṃ sadārhasi // Rm_17.192{93} //	tri ratna Bajanam nityam kArayitum sadA arhasi // Rm_17.192{93} //
   tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /	taTA te maMgalam nityam sarvatra api Bavet Druvam /
   kramāt pāramitā pūrya bodhiṃ cāpi samāpsyasi // Rm_17.193{94} //	kramAt pAramitA pUrya boDim ca api samApsyasi // Rm_17.193{94} //
   iti tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /	iti tena arhata Adizwam SrutvA aSokaH sa BUpatiH /
   tathā hīti pratijñāya prābhyanandan sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_17.194{95} //	taTA hi iti pratijQAya prAByanandan sa pArzadaH // Rm_17.194{95} //
   kacaṃgalāyā avadānam etac chṛṇvanti ye śrāvayatīha yaś ca /	kacaMgalAyAH avadAnam etat SRNvanti ye SrAvayati iha yaH ca /
   vihāya pāpaṃ khalu te 'pi sarve bhuktvā sukhāny eva sugatiṃ vrajanti //	vihAya pApam Kalu te api sarve BuktvA suKAni eva sugatim vrajanti //

   (Rm 227)	(Rm 227)
   XVIII Dhanikāvadāna	XVIII DhanikA avadAna
   athāśoko mahīpālaḥ kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /	aTa aSokaH mahIpAlaH kRta aMjali puwaH mudA /
   upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_18.1{1} //	upaguptam gurum natvA punar evam samabravIt // Rm_18.1{1} //
   bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /	Badanta Srotum icCAmi punar anyat su BAzitam /
   tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_18.2{2} //	tat yaTA guruNA Adizwam taTA adezwum ca me arhati // Rm_18.2{2} //
   iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /	iti saMprArTitam rAjQA SrutvA saH arhan suDIH yatiH /
   upagupto narendraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_18.3{3} //	upaguptaH narendram tam samAlokya evam abravIt // Rm_18.3{3} //
   śṛṇu rājan samādhāya yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /	SRNu rAjan samADAya yaTA me guruNA uditam /
   tathāhaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tava puṇyapravṛddhaye // Rm_18.4{4} //	taTA aham saMpravakzyAmi tava puNya pravRdDaye // Rm_18.4{4} //
   puraikasamaye sa śrīśākyasiṃho munīśvaraḥ /	pura eka samaye sa SrI SAkya siMhaH muni ISvaraH /
   sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_18.5{5} //	sarvajQaH sugataH SAstA DarmarAjaH vinAyakaH // Rm_18.5{5} //
   bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ bhikṣuṇībhiś ca cailakaiḥ /	BikzuBiH SrAvakEH sArdDam BikzuNIBiH ca cElakEH /
   upāsakai mahāśrāddhair upāsikāgaṇair api // Rm_18.6{6} //	upAsakEH mahA SrAdDEH upAsikA gaNEH api // Rm_18.6{6} //
   bodhisatvagaṇaiś cāpi mahāsatvaiḥ śubhārthibhiḥ /	boDisatva gaNEH ca api mahAsatvEH SuBa arTiBiH /
   sarvasatvahitārthāya bodhicaryāṃ prakāśibhiḥ // Rm_18.7{7} //	sarva satva hita arTAya boDi caryAm prakASiBiH // Rm_18.7{7} //
   vṛjiṣu puri vaiśālyāṃ markaṭākhyahradāntike /	vRjizu puri vESAlyAm markawa AKya hrada antike /
   kūṭāgāraguhāvāse vijahāra prabhāsayan // Rm_18.8{8} //	kUwa AgAra guhA vAse vijahAra praBAsayan // Rm_18.8{8} //
   tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tatra sarve samāgatāḥ /	tat sadDarma amRtam pAtum tatra sarve samAgatAH /
   brahmaśakrādidevendrā lokapālā digāsthitāḥ // Rm_18.9{9} //	brahma Sakra Adi deva indrAH lokapAlAH diS AsTitAH // Rm_18.9{9} //
   grahāḥ siddhagaṇāḥ sādhyā yakṣagaṃdharvakinnarāḥ /	grahAH sidDa gaNAH sADyAH yakza gaMDarva kinnarAH /
   garuḍā nāgarājāś ca vidyādharāś ca dānavāḥ // Rm_18.10{10} //	garuxAH nAga rAjAH ca vidyADarAH ca dAnavAH // Rm_18.10{10} //
   rākṣasāḥ sagaṇāś caiva ṛṣayo brahmacāriṇaḥ /	rAkzasAH sa gaNAH ca eva RzayaH brahmacAriNaH /
   brahmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā bhūpā rājāno 'pi narādhipāḥ // Rm_18.11{11} //	brahmaNAH kzatriyAH BUpAH rAjAnaH api narADipAH // Rm_18.11{11} //
   tathā rājakumārāś ca vaiśyā maṃtrijanā api /	taTA rAja kumArAH ca vESyAH maMtri janAH api /
   gṛhasthāḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ paurāḥ sārthavāhā mahājanāḥ // Rm_18.12{12} //	gRhasTAH SrezWinaH pOrAH sArTavAhAH mahA janAH // Rm_18.12{12} //
   vaṇijaḥ śilpinaś cāpi tathānye 'pi śubhārthinaḥ /	vaNijaH SilpinaH ca api taTA anye api SuBa arTinaH /
   grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi tathā kārpaṭikā api // Rm_18.13{13} //	grAmyAH jAnapadAH ca api taTA kArpawikAH api // Rm_18.13{13} //
   evam anye 'pi lokāś ca saddharmāmṛtavāṃchinaḥ /	evam anye api lokAH ca sadDarma amRtavAMCinaH /
   sarve te samupāyātās tatrādrākṣus tam īśvaraṃ // Rm_18.14{14} //	sarve te samupAyAtAH tatra adrAkzuH tam ISvaram // Rm_18.14{14} //
   sabhāmadhyāsanāsīnaṃ sarvasaṃghapuraskṛtaṃ /	saBAm aDyAsana AsInam sarva saMGa puraskRtam /
   śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya sarve te samupāśritāḥ // Rm_18.15{15} //	SrIGanam tam samAlokya sarve te samupASritAH // Rm_18.15{15} //

   tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_18.16{16} //	tat sadDarma amRtam pAtum upatasTuH samAhitAH // Rm_18.16{16} //
   tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /	tadA sa BagavAn dRzwvA tAn sarvAn samupasTitAn /
   ādimadhyāntakalyāṇīṃ bodhicaryāṃ samādiśat // Rm_18.17{17} //	Adi maDya anta kalyANIm boDi caryAm samAdiSat // Rm_18.17{17} //
   (Rm 228)	(Rm 228)
   tadāryadharmam ākarṇya sarve lokāḥ pramoditāḥ /	tad A Arya Darmam AkarNya sarve lokAH pramoditAH /

   tadā tatra dvijā sarve bhaktimanto jagadguroḥ /	tadA tatra dvijA sarve BaktimantaH jagadguroH /

   ato nimaṃtraṇīyo 'tra sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya nānyathā // Rm_18.24{24} //	atas nimaMtraNIyaH atra sarvEH saMBUya na anyaTA // Rm_18.24{24} //

   tadā sa dhaniko 'jñātvā samayaṃ tais tathā kṛtaṃ /	tadA sa DanikaH ajQAtvA samayam tEH taTA kRtam /

   tadā te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve saṃbhūya samupāgatāḥ /	tadA te brAhmaNAH sarve saMBUya samupAgatAH /

   etad ākarṇya sarve te brāhmaṇā bheditāśayāḥ /	etat AkarNya sarve te brAhmaNAH Bedita ASayAH /
   paraṃ pratīkṣyamānāś ca śanaiḥ svasvagṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_18.33{33} //	param pratIkzyamAnAH ca SanEs sva sva gRham yayuH // Rm_18.33{33} //
   tataḥ sa dhaniko matvā munīndreṇādhyuvāsitaṃ /	tatas sa DanikaH matvA muni indreNa aDyuvAsitam /

   tatra sa svagṛhe gatvā vāṃdhaveṣṭajanais saha /	tatra sa sva gRhe gatvA vA aMDavezwa janEH saha /
   tadarhabhojyasāmagrīṃ sahasā samasādhyayat // Rm_18.35{35} //	tad arha Bojya sAmagrIm sahasA samasADyayat // Rm_18.35{35} //
   tato bhojyasthalaṃ tatra śodhayitvā samantataḥ /	tatas Bojya sTalam tatra SoDayitvA samantataH /
   ratnadhvajair vitānaiś ca sa patākair amaṇḍayat // Rm_18.36{36} //	ratna DvajEH vitAnEH ca sa patAkEH amaNxayat // Rm_18.36{36} //
   tato yathākramaṃ tatra divyaratnamayāni ca /	tatas yaTAkramam tatra divya ratna mayAni ca /
   svāsanāni samāstīryya sugaṃdhīḥ samadhūpayat // Rm_18.37{37} //	sva AsanAni samAstIryya sugaMDIH samaDUpayat // Rm_18.37{37} //
   (Rm 229)	(Rm 229)
   tataḥ sa prātar utthāya snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtaḥ /	tatas sa prAtar utTAya snAtvA SudDa amvara AvRtaH /
   pūjāpādyārghasāmagrīṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pramoditaḥ // Rm_18.38{38} //	pUjA pAdya arGa sAmagrIm pratizWApya pramoditaH // Rm_18.38{38} //
   savāṃdhaveṣṭajanas tatra kūṭāgāre samācarat /	sa vAMDavezwa janaH tatra kUwAgAre samAcarat /

   yathānayā kṛtaṃ tatra praṇidhānaṃ tathā 'dhunā /	yaTA anayA kRtam tatra praNiDAnam taTA aDunA /
   māṃ śāstāram āgamya sākṣād arhatvam āpyate // Rm_36.236{34} //	mAm SAstAram Agamya sAkzAt arha tvam Apyate // Rm_36.236{34} //
   evaṃ hi yat kṛtaṃ yena tenaiva bhujyate phalaṃ /	evam hi yat kRtam yena tena eva Bujyate Palam /
   abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma na cānyathā kvacit // Rm_36.237{35} //	aBuktam kzIyate na eva karma na ca anyaTA kvacid // Rm_36.237{35} //
   evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre sarvadā śubhavāṃchibhiḥ /	evam matvA atra saMsAre sarvadA SuBa vAMCiBiH /
   saddharmaṃ samupāśritya caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_36.238{36} //	sadDarmam samupASritya caritavyam SuBe sadA // Rm_36.238{36} //
   śubhe caranti ye nityaṃ na te gachaṃti durgatīṃ /	SuBe caranti ye nityam na te gaCaMti durgatIm /
   sadgatim eva saṃyānti bodhiṃ ca samavāpnuyuḥ // Rm_36.239{37} //	sat gatim eva saMyAnti boDim ca samavApnuyuH // Rm_36.239{37} //
   ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te sāṃghikā api /	iti Adizwam muni indreNa SrutvA te sAMGikAH api /
   sarve tatheti vijñapya prābhyanaṃdan prabodhitāḥ // Rm_36.240{38} //	sarve taTA iti vijQapya prAByanaMdan praboDitAH // Rm_36.240{38} //
   ity ādiṣṭaṃ hi me śāstrā śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /	iti Adizwam hi me SAstrA Srutam mayA taTA ucyate /
   śrutvāpy evaṃ tathā rājaṃ caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_36.241{39} //	SrutvA api evam taTA rAjam caritavyam SuBe sadA // Rm_36.241{39} //
   prajāś cāpi mahārāja bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /	prajAH ca api mahA rAja boDayitvA prayatnataH /
   bodhimārge pratisthāpya pālayasva samāhitaḥ // Rm_36.242{40} //	boDi mArge pratisTApya pAlayasva samAhitaH // Rm_36.242{40} //
   tathā hi te sadā bhadraṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /	taTA hi te sadA Badram sarvatra api Bavet Druvam /
   kramād bodhiṃ ca saṃprāpya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_36.243{41} //	kramAt boDim ca saMprApya saMbudDa padam ApnuyAH // Rm_36.243{41} //
   iti tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /	iti tena arhata Adizwam SrutvA aSokaH sa BUpatiH /
   tathā hīti pratijñapya prābhyanaṃdat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_36.244{42} //	taTA hi iti pratijQapya prAByanaMdat sa pArzadaH // Rm_36.244{42} //
   muktāvadānaṃ manujā idaṃ ye śṛṇvaṃti ye cāpi niśāmayanti /	mukta avadAnam manujAH idam ye SRNvaMti ye ca api niSAmayanti /
   te sarva evaṃ sukhitā śubhāni kṛtvā prayānti sugatālayan te //	te sarve evam suKitA SuBAni kRtvA prayAnti sugatAlayan te //
   Rm_36.245{43} //	Rm_36.245{43} //
   ++ iti ratnāvadānatatve muktāvadānaṃ samāptam ++	++ iti ratna avadAnata tve mukta avadAnam samAptam ++

   XXXVII Dhīmatyāvadāna	XXXVII DhImatyAvadAna
   athāśoko mahīndro 'sau kṛtāṃjaliḥ pramoditaḥ /	aTa aSokaH mahIndraH asO kRta aMjaliH pramoditaH /
   upaguptaṃ tam arhantaṃ natvaivaṃ punar abravīt // Rm_37.1{1} //	upaguptam tam arhantam natvA evam punar abravIt // Rm_37.1{1} //
   bhadanta ye mahāsatvā bodhisatvā yathepsitaṃ /	Badanta ye mahAsatvAH boDisatvAH yaTA Ipsitam /
   sarvārthibhyaḥ pradatvaivaṃ dānaṃ kurvanti sarvadā // Rm_37.2{2} //	sarva arTiByaH pradatvA evam dAnam kurvanti sarvadA // Rm_37.2{2} //
   teṣām evaṃ pradatte 'pi tad dravyaṃ kṣīyate na hi /	tezAm evam pradatte api tat dravyam kzIyate na hi /
   punarvṛddhitamaṃ yāti tat kathaṃ me samādiśa // Rm_37.3{3} //	punar vRdDitamam yAti tat kaTam me samAdiSa // Rm_37.3{3} //
   katamadvratapuṇyasya prabhāvāc chrīḥ pravarddhate /	katamat vrata puNyasya praBAvAt SrIH pravardDate /
   tad vrataṃ me bhavāñ chāstā samyag ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_37.4{4} //	tat vratam me BavAn CAstA samyak Adezwum arhati // Rm_37.4{4} //
   iti saṃprārthite rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan yatiḥ sudhīḥ /	iti saMprArTite rAjQA SrutvA saH arhan yatiH suDIH /
   upagupto narendraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_37.5{5} //	upaguptaH narendram tam samAlokya evam AdiSat // Rm_37.5{5} //
   śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /	SRNu rAjan mahABAga yaTA me guruNA uditam /
   tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi loke dharmābhivṛddhaye // Rm_37.6{6} //	taTA aham te pravakzyAmi loke Darma aBivRdDaye // Rm_37.6{6} //
   ye satyasamādhānāḥ śuddhaśīlāḥ śubhārthinaḥ /	ye satya samADAnAH SudDa SIlAH SuBa arTinaH /
   vasudhārāmahādevyāś caranti vratam uttamaṃ // Rm_37.7{7} //	vasu DArA mahAdevyAH caranti vratam uttamam // Rm_37.7{7} //
   teṣāṃ na kṣīyate dravyaṃ pradatte 'pi sadā gṛhe /	tezAm na kzIyate dravyam pradatte api sadA gRhe /
   pravṛddhitaram eva syād vasudhārānubhāvataḥ // Rm_37.8{8} //	pravRdDitaram eva syAt vasu DArA anuBAvataH // Rm_37.8{8} //
   tadyathāsīt purā buddhaḥ śākyasiṃho munīśvaraḥ /	tat yaTA AsIt purA budDaH SAkya siMhaH muni ISvaraH /
   sarvajño 'rhañ jagacchāstā dharmarājas tathāgataḥ // Rm_37.9{9} //	sarvajQaH arhan jagat SAstA DarmarAjaH taTAgataH // Rm_37.9{9} //
   bhagavānn ekadā tatra vārāṇasyāḥ purāntike /	BagavAn ekadA tatra vArANasyAH pura antike /
   mṛgadave jināvāse vijahāra sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_37.10{10} //	mRga dave jina AvAse vijahAra sa sAMGikaH // Rm_37.10{10} //
   tadā tad dharmapīyūṣaṃ pātuṃ śakrādayo 'marāḥ /	tadA tat Darma pIyUzam pAtum Sakra AdayaH amarAH /
   brahmādi brāhmaṇāś cāpi sarve lokādhipā api // Rm_37.11{11} //	brahma Adi brAhmaNAH ca api sarve loka aDipAH api // Rm_37.11{11} //
   siddhā vidyādharā daityā yakṣagaṃdharvakinnarāḥ /	sidDAH vidyADarAH dEtyAH yakza gaMDarva kinnarAH /
   rākṣasā garuḍā nāgās tathānye 'pi samāgatāḥ // Rm_37.12{12} //	rAkzasAH garuxAH nAgAH taTA anye api samAgatAH // Rm_37.12{12} //
   yatayo yoginaś cāpi tīrthikāś ca tapaśvinaḥ /	yatayaH yoginaH ca api tIrTikAH ca tapaSvinaH /
   nirgranthā vītarāgāś ca munayo brahmacāriṇaḥ // Rm_37.13{13} //	nirgranTAH vIta rAgAH ca munayaH brahmacAriNaH // Rm_37.13{13} //
   evam anye 'pi lokāḥ saṃbuddhadharmavāṃchinaḥ /	evam anye api lokAH saMbudDa Darma vAMCinaH /
   tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ mudā tatra samāgatāḥ // Rm_37.14{14} //	tat sadDarma amRtam pAtum mudA tatra samAgatAH // Rm_37.14{14} //
   tatpurādhipatī rājā viśvabhadrābhidho mahān /	tad pura aDipatiH rAjA viSvaBadra aBiDaH mahAn /
   tasya bhāryā priyādevī ratnamālābhidhā satī // Rm_37.15{15} //	tasya BAryA priyAdevI ratna mAlA aBiDA satI // Rm_37.15{15} //
   tadātmajakumārāṃśaḥ sūryaprabhābhidhaḥ kṛtī /	tad Atmaja kumAra aMSaH sUrya praBA aBiDaH kRtI /
   tadātmajā ramākārā kumārī vimalābhidhā // Rm_37.16{16} //	tad AtmajA rama AkArA kumArI vimala aBiDA // Rm_37.16{16} //
   anye 'py antarjanāś cāpi sa jñātimitravāṃdhavāḥ /	anye api antarjanAH ca api sa jQAti mitra vAMDavAH /
   purohitādayaś cāpi vedavijñā dvijātayaḥ // Rm_37.17{17} //	purohita AdayaH ca api veda vijQAH dvijAtayaH // Rm_37.17{17} //
   vaiśyāś ca maṃtriṇo 'mātyā gṛhasthāś ca mahājanāḥ /	vESyAH ca maMtriNaH amAtyAH gRhasTAH ca mahAjanAH /
   vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca śilpinaś cāpi paurikāḥ // Rm_37.18{18} //	vaNijaH sArTavAhAH ca SilpinaH ca api pOrikAH // Rm_37.18{18} //
   grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi tathā kārpaṭikā api /	grAmyAH jAnapadAH ca api taTA kArpawikAH api /
   (Rm 411)	(Rm 411)
   evam anye 'pi lokāś ca sarve te samupāgatāḥ // Rm_37.19{19} //	evam anye api lokAH ca sarve te samupAgatAH // Rm_37.19{19} //
   tatretya taṃ sabhāsīnaṃ sarvasaṃghapuraskṛtaṃ /	tatra itya tam saBA AsInam sarva saMGa puraskRtam /
   saṃbuddhaṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā muditāḥ samupācaran // Rm_37.20{20} //	saMbudDam SrIGanam dRzwvA muditAH samupAcaran // Rm_37.20{20} //

   tataḥ śokālaye sthitvā tat saṃpatkṣīyaciṃtayā /	tatas Soka Alaye sTitvA tat saMpatkzIya ciMtayA /

   yat te 'tra jāyate duḥkhaṃ tad vadasva manogataṃ // Rm_37.34{34} //	yat te atra jAyate duHKam tat vadasva manogatam // Rm_37.34{34} //
   iṭi bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa bharttābhiviniśvasan /	iwi BAryA uditam SrutvA sa BarttA aBiviniSvasan /
   tāṃ bhāryāṃ supriyāṃ kāṃtāṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_37.35{35} //	tAm BAryAm supriyAm kAMtAm samAlokya evam abravIt // Rm_37.35{35} //

   yat saṃpadaḥ parikṣīṇā āyā me 'tra na vidyate // Rm_37.36{36} //	yat saMpadaH parikzINA AyAH me atra na vidyate // Rm_37.36{36} //
   putrapautrādayo 'neke bahayo me kuṭumbinaḥ /	putra pOtra AdayaH aneke bahayaH me kuwumbinaH /
   karmakarādayo bhṛtyā dāsīdāsādayo janāḥ // Rm_37.37{37} //	karmakara AdayaH BRtyAH dAsI dAsa AdayaH janAH // Rm_37.37{37} //

   kathaṃ tāns toṣayiṣyāmi kramāt kṣīṇā hi saṃpadaḥ // Rm_37.38{38} //	kaTam tAn H tozayizyAmi kramAt kzINAH hi saMpadaH // Rm_37.38{38} //

   parikhinnavibhinnāsyā vrajiṣyanti nirāśayāḥ // Rm_37.39{39} //	pariKinna viBinna AsyAH vrajizyanti nirASayAH // Rm_37.39{39} //
   (Rm 412)	(Rm 412)
   iti cintāviṣaṇṇe me hṛdi duḥkhaṃ prajāyate /	iti cintA vizaNNe me hRdi duHKam prajAyate /

   rājā bhavaṃtu dhārmiṣṭho nayasthāḥ saṃtu maṃtriṇaḥ // Rm_38.996{33} //	rAjA BavaMtu DArmizWaH naya sTAH saMtu maMtriNaH // Rm_38.996{33} //
   sarve sainyāś ca yodhāro jayaṃtu dūrjanān narīn /	sarve sEnyAH ca yoDAraH jayaMtu dUrjanAt narIn /
   sarvetayaḥ praśāmyaṃtu saṃtu saukhyānvitāḥ prajāḥ // Rm_38.997{34} //	sarva itayaH praSAmyaMtu saMtu sOKya anvitAH prajAH // Rm_38.997{34} //
   nīrujāḥ sukhasaṃpannāḥ śrīsaṃpattisamanvitāḥ /	nIrujAH suKa saMpannAH SrI saMpatti samanvitAH /
   brahmādi lokapālāś ca daśadikpā maharddhikāḥ /	brahma Adi lokapAlAH ca daSa dikpAH mahardDikAH /
   vighnāñ jitvā śubhaṃ kṛtvā pālayaṃtu prajāḥ sadā // Rm_38.998{35} //	viGnAn jitvA SuBam kRtvA pAlayaMtu prajAH sadA // Rm_38.998{35} //
   sarve traidhātulokāś ca kṛtvā maitrīṃ parasparaṃ /	sarve trEDAtu lokAH ca kRtvA mEtrIm parasparam /
   triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caraṃtu bodhicārikāṃ // Rm_38.999{36} //	tri ratna Bajanam kRtvA caraMtu boDi cArikAm // Rm_38.999{36} //
   sarve bhadrāṇi paśyaṃtu mā kaścit pāpam ācarat /	sarve BadrANi paSyaMtu mA kaScid pApam Acarat /
   sarvatra śāsanaṃ bauddhaṃ dhṛtvā yāṃtu jinālayaṃ // Rm_38.1000{37} //	sarvatra SAsanam bOdDam DRtvA yAMtu jina Alayam // Rm_38.1000{37} //
   evaṃ jayaśrīr munirājakalpaḥ saṃbodhicaryāpravikāśahetoḥ /	evam jaya SrIH muni rAja kalpaH saMboDi caryA pravikASa hetoH /
   sarvān svaśiṣyān paribodhayan saḥ samādideśa śryavadānamālāṃ /	sarvAn sva SizyAn pariboDayan saH samAdideSa Sryava dAna mAlAm /
   śrutvāpi te sarva udāracittāḥ śrutvā salokā abhinaṃdyamānāḥ /	SrutvA api te sarve udAra cittAH SrutvA sa lokAH aBinaMdyamAnAH /
   saddharmam āśritya sadā triratnaṃ bhaktyā bhajaṃta vyaharan pramādā //	sadDarmam ASritya sadA tri ratnam BaktyA BajaMta vyaharan pramAdAH //
   Rm_38.1001{38} //	Rm_38.1001{38} //
   yatredaṃ sūtrarājeṃdraṃ prāvarttayet kalāv api bhāṣed yaḥ śṛṇuyād yaś ca	yatra idam sUtrarAja iMdram prAvarttayet kalO api BAzet yaH SRNuyAt yaH ca
   śrāvayed yaś ca cārayet /	SrAvayet yaH ca cArayet /
   eteṣāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ saṃbuddhāḥ sakalā sadā kṛpādṛṣṭyā samālokya kurvaṃtu	etezAm tatra sarvezAm saMbudDAH sakalA sadA kRpA dRzwyA samAlokya kurvaMtu
   bhadram ābhavaṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā devyas tesāṃ tatra sadā śivaṃ /	Badram ABavam sarvAH pAramitA devyaH tesAm tatra sadA Sivam /
   kurvantyo bodhisaṃbhāraṃ pūrayaṃtu jagaddhite /	kurvantyaH boDi saMBAram pUrayaMtu jagat hite /
   anena saddharmarasāmṛtena sarvajñabhāsvadvadanodbhavena /	anena sadDarma rasa amRtena sarvajQa BAsvat vadana udBavena /
   kleśānalaprahvarir āturāsu prajāsu duḥkhaṃ praśamo 'stu nityaṃ //	kleSa anala prahvariH AturAsu prajAsu duHKam praSamaH astu nityam //
   Rm_38.1002{39} //	Rm_38.1002{39} //
   ++ iti subhāṣitaratnāvadānatatve vasudhārā vratakathā samāptā ++	++ iti suBAzita ratna avadAnata tve vasu DArA vrata kaTA samAptAH ++
   śreyo 'stu samvat 1028 māghamāse kṛṣṇapakṣe dvitīyāyāṃ tithau	SreyaH astu samvat 1028 mAGa mAse kRzNa pakze dvitIyAyAm tiTO
   pūrvaphālguṇīnakṣatre suddhayoge budhavāsare kuṃbharāśigate savitari	pUrva PAlguNI nakzatre sudDayoge buDa vAsare kuMBara ASi gate savitari
   siṃharāśigate caṃdramasi etaddine saṃpūrṇam idaiḥ pustakaṃ (Rm 481)	siMha rASi gate caMdramasi etat dine saMpUrNam idEH pustakam (Rm 481)
   mānadevasaṃskāritacakramahāvihāre nivāsitaḥ vajrācāryyaśrīdharmmarājena	mAnadeva saMskArita cakra mahA vihAre nivAsitaH vajra AcAryI aSrI Darmma rAjena
   likhitam idaṃ pustakam etatpuṇyena dharmmārthakāmamokṣān prāptim astu	liKitam idam pustakam etat puNyena Darmma arTa kAma mokzAn prAptim astu
   śvapustakasunānaṃ lobhayāyamadu ||	Sva pustaka sunAnam loBayA Ayamadu ||
